item.title: The second term of “Famous National Doctor”.
item.description: Professor Xu Ruihua was awarded the second term of “Famous National Doctor” The Second National Famous Doctors Summit, sponsored by People’s Daily and Health Times, was held in Beijing People’s Daily. Professor Xu Ruihua, Director and Dean of CancerControl Center of Sun Yat-sen University, was awarded the honorary title of “National Doctor, Outstanding Style”. Prof. Lu Taixiang, Senior

item.title: New breakthroughs
item.description: A team of Chinese, Japanese and Korean researchers led by Professor Xu Ruihua of Sun Yat-sen University’s Cancer Hospital conducted a large-scale, multi-center, phase III clinical trial of patients with advanced colorectal cancer after failed first-line treatment, AXEPT Research (Study No. NCT01996306) Objective To investigate the efficacy and tolerance of the modified double-drug combination scheme ( capecitabine+ irinotecan, XELIRI for short).

item.title: about us
item.description: p{text-indent: 1cm} Brief Introduction of the Leader of the Task Force Xu Ruihua, M.D. ( M.D. ), Ph. D.).Director of the cancer prevention and treatment center of Sun Yat-sen University;baijie, the new century talents of the Ministry of Education, Member of the Department of Biology and Medicine of the Science and Technology Commission of the Ministry of Education, vice president of the Chinese Society of Clinical Oncology ( CSCO ), and vice director of the China Medical Biotechnology Association chairman of the Guangdong Anti-Cancer Association, chairman of the targeted therapy Committee of the China Anti-Cancer Association, and the chemotherapy section of the large intestine cancer committee of the China Anti-Cancer Associationteam leader,Journal Of Chief editor of cancer.

item.title: 2018article
item.description: Cell Res Feng Wang, Dong-Bing Liu, Qi Zhao, Gang Chen, Xin-Ming Liu, Ying-Nan Wang, Hong Su, Yan-Ru Qin, Yi-Fu He, Qing-Feng Zou, Yan-Hui Liu, You-En Lin, Ze-Xian Liu, Jin-Xin Bei, Rui-Hua Xu The genomic landscape of small cell carcinoma of the esophagus.In Cell Res. 2018 May 4. Cancer Res Yun-Xin Lu, Huai-Qiang Ju, Ze-Xian Liu, Dong-Liang Chen, Yun Wang, Qi Zhao, Qi-Nian Wu, Zhao-lei Zeng, Hai-Bo Qiu, Pei-Shan Hu, Zhi-Qiang
